verses.name: Ezekiel 5:3
verses.text: Thou shalt also take thereof a few in number, and bind them in thy skirts.

verses.name: Ezekiel 5:4
verses.text: Then take of them again, and cast them into the midst of the fire, and burn them in the fire; for thereof shall a fire come forth into all the house of Israel.

verses.name: Ezekiel 5:5
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; This is Jerusalem: I have set it in the midst of the nations and countries that are round about her.
